II.iii.3.B.1.d
.
Homeless Veteran Address Resources
Use the following resources when researching a homeless Veteran’s address:
Homeless Shelter Directory
Regional Office Homeless Coordinator Directory
, and
HUD Exchange
.
Reference
:  For more information on processing claims for homeless Veterans, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 1.2
, and
M27-1, Part II, 3
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section B - System Updates at Intake
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section B
